TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServicePoint extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供 HTTP 连接的连接管理。

span.span: Provides connection management for HTTP connections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类处理连接到 Internet 资源基于传递中资源的统一资源标识符 (URI) 的主机信息。The class handles connections to an Internet resource based on the host information passed in the resource's Uniform Resource Identifier (URI). 资源的初始连接确定信息的对象维护，然后对该资源的所有后续请求的共享。The initial connection to the resource determines the information that the object maintains, which is then shared by all subsequent requests to that resource. 对象由类，并创建，如有必要，通过方法。 objects are managed by the class and are created, if necessary, by the method. 对象永远不会直接创建，但始终创建和管理通过类。 objects are never created directly but are always created and managed by the class. 最大数目可以创建的对象由设置属性。The maximum number of objects that can be created is set by the property. 每个对象维护其连接到 Internet 资源直到它已空闲时间中指定的时间超过属性。Each object maintains its connection to an Internet resource until it has been idle longer than the time specified in the property. 当超出了值，它可以回收到另一个连接。When a exceeds the value, it can be recycled to another connection. 默认值情况下设置属性。The default value of is set by the property. 当属性设置为-1，并且指定的时间过后，活动以外的值服务的下一个请求之后关闭连接。When the property is set to a value other than -1, and after the specified time elapses, an active connection is closed after it services the next request. 这是适用于应用程序，因为它们是默认情况下不需要无限期，打开的活动连接。This is useful for applications that do not require active connections that are opened indefinitely, as they are by default. > [!NOTE] > 在高负载情况下，某些应用程序可能会耗尽可用线程在 ThreadPool 中，这可能会导致不佳的系统性能 （例如高和变量的事务时间）。In high load conditions, some applications may run out of free threads in the ThreadPool, which may lead to poor system performance (such as high and variable transaction times). 请参阅[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/dnpag/html/scalenetchapt17.asp ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/dnpag/html/scalenetchapt17.asp)数可以进行若要解决此问题的配置更改。See [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/dnpag/html/scalenetchapt17.asp](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/dnpag/html/scalenetchapt17.asp) for a number of configuration changes you can make to fix this issue. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建连接到 URI www.contoso.com 的对象。The following code example creates a object that connects to the URI www.contoso.com. [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePoint#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CPP/servicepoint.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePoint#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CS/servicepoint.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePoint#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/VB/servicepoint.vb#1)]

value.span: 默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些负载平衡技术需要客户端使用特定本地 IP 地址和端口号，而非(或的 Internet 协议版本 6) 和临时端口。Some load balancing techniques require a client to use a specific local IP address and port number, rather than (or for Internet Protocol Version 6) and an ephemeral port. 你可以满足此要求。Your can satisfy this requirement.

span.span: for binding to a local port.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool CloseConnectionGroup(string connectionGroupName) cil managed
Public Function CloseConnectionGroup (connectionGroupName As String) As Boolean

param.name: connectionGroupName
param.span: 连接组的名称，该连接组包含要关闭的和要从此服务点移除的连接。

span.span: The name of the connection group that contains the connections to close and remove from this service point.

summary.span: 从此 对象移除指定的连接组。

span.span: Removes the specified connection group from this object.

returns.span: 指示连接组是否关闭的 值。

span.span: A value that indicates whether the connection group was closed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 连接组将与一个特定的连接或连接的一组相关联请求的集。Connection groups associate a set of requests with a particular connection or set of connections. 此方法将移除并属于指定的连接组的所有连接将都关闭。This method removes and closes all connections that belong to the specified connection group.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置在多少毫秒之后关闭活动 连接。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of milliseconds after which an active connection is closed.

value.span: ，它指定活动 连接保持打开的毫秒数。

span.span: A that specifies the number of milliseconds that an active connection remains open.

value.span: 默认值为 -1，这样活动 连接可以无限期保持连接。

span.span: The default is -1, which allows an active connection to stay connected indefinitely.

value.span: 将此属性设置为 0 可在 连接为请求提供服务之后强制关闭该连接。

span.span: Set this property to 0 to force connections to close after servicing a request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此属性以确保对象的活动连接保持打开无限期。You can use this property to ensure that a object's active connections do not remain open indefinitely. 此属性适用于方案应删除并定期，如负载平衡方案重新建立连接。This property is intended for scenarios where connections should be dropped and reestablished periodically, such as load balancing scenarios. 默认情况下，当是`true`对于请求，属性设置的超时时间为右由于处于非活动状态的连接。By default, when is `true` for a request, the property sets the time-out for closing connections due to inactivity. 如果有活动连接时，不起作用并无限期地保持打开的连接。If the has active connections, has no effect and the connections remain open indefinitely. 当属性设置为-1，并且指定的时间过后，活动以外的值为请求提供服务的设置后关闭连接到`false`该请求中。When the property is set to a value other than -1, and after the specified time elapses, an active connection is closed after servicing a request by setting to `false` in that request. 设置此值会影响管理的所有连接对象。Setting this value affects all connections managed by the object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置此属性的值。The following code example sets the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLServicePoint#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLServicePoint/CPP/nclservicepoint.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NCLServicePoint#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLServicePoint/CS/nclservicepoint.cs#1)] [!code-vb[NCLServicePoint#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLServicePoint/VB/nclservicepoint.vb#1)]

exception.span: 为 Set 操作指定的值为小于 -1 的负数。

span.span: The value specified for a set operation is a negative number less than -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置的最大连接数对象可以使对 Internet 资源。The property sets the maximum number of connections that the object can make to an Internet resource. 值属性设置为的值属性时创建对象; 后续更改为具有不会影响现有对象。The value of the property is set to the value of the property when the object is created; subsequent changes to have no effect on existing objects. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用要检查的最大连接数属性的对象可以建立到指定的统一资源标识符 (URI)。The following code example uses the property to check the maximum number of connections that the object can make to the specified Uniform Resource Identifier (URI). [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePoint#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CPP/servicepoint.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePoint#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CS/servicepoint.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePoint#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/VB/servicepoint.vb#4)]

exception.span: 连接限制为 0 或小于 0。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果对象通过调用构造重载，并参数，则属性表示属性使用的对象。If the object was constructed by calling a overload with a argument, then the property represents the property of the object used. 如果对象从网络主机和端口，构造属性包含一个字符串，表示在主机和网络端口。If the object was constructed from a network host and port, the property contains a string that represents the host and the network port. 如果属性从主机和端口，仅在构造时设置对象具有相同值可以使用此对象。If the property is set when constructed from a host and port, only objects with the same value can use this object. ## Examples [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePoint#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CPP/servicepoint.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePoint#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CS/servicepoint.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePoint#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/VB/servicepoint.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Expect100Continue { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Expect100Continue : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 值，该值确定是否使用 100-Continue 行为。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether 100-Continue behavior is used.

value.span: 如果 请求需要 100-Continue 响应，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to expect 100-Continue responses for requests; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为`true`，客户端请求使用`POST`方法会收到一个 100-继续响应的服务器，用于指示客户端应发送要发布的数据。When this property is set to `true`, client requests that use the `POST` method expect to receive a 100-Continue response from the server to indicate that the client should send the data to be posted. 此机制允许客户端以避免通过网络发送大量数据时的服务器，根据请求标头，想要拒绝此请求。This mechanism allows clients to avoid sending large amounts of data over the network when the server, based on the request headers, intends to reject the request. 例如，假设属性是`false`。For example, assume the property is `false`. 当请求发送到服务器时，它包含的数据。When the request is sent to the server, it includes the data. 如果在读取请求标头之后, 的服务器要求身份验证并发送 401 响应，客户端必须重新发送具有正确的身份验证标头的数据。If, after reading the request headers, the server requires authentication and sends a 401 response, the client must resend the data with proper authentication headers. 如果属性是`true`，请求标头发送到服务器。If the property is `true`, the request headers are sent to the server. 如果服务器不拒绝请求，则会发送一个 100-继续响应信号可以传输数据。If the server has not rejected the request, it sends a 100-Continue response signaling that the data can be transmitted. 如果在上述示例中，服务器需要身份验证，将它发送 401 响应，客户端没有不必要地传输数据。If, as in the preceding example, the server requires authentication, it sends the 401 response and the client has not unnecessarily transmitted the data. 更改此属性的值不影响现有连接。Changing the value of this property does not affect existing connections. 仅在更改后创建的新连接会受到影响。Only new connections created after the change are affected. Expect 100-继续在 IETF RFC 2616 部分 10.1.1 完全介绍行为。The Expect 100-Continue behavior is fully described in IETF RFC 2616 Section 10.1.1. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了此属性的值。The following code example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePoint#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CPP/servicepoint.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePoint#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CS/servicepoint.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePoint#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/VB/servicepoint.vb#9)]

summary.span: 获取上次将 对象连接到主机的日期和时间。

span.span: Gets the date and time that the object was last connected to a host.

value.span: 对象，包含上次连接 对象的日期和时间。

span.span: A object that contains the date and time at which the object was last connected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性记录的最后一个日期和时间的服务点已从主机断开连接。The property records the last date and time at which a service point was disconnected from a host. 时的当前时间之间的差异和超出了值，则对象是可用于回收到另一个连接。When the difference between the current time and exceeds the value of , the object is available for recycling to another connection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性来设置和检索日期和时间的对象上次连接到主机。The following code example uses the property to set and retrieve the date and time that the object was last connected to a host. [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePoint#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CPP/servicepoint.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePoint#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CS/servicepoint.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePoint#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/VB/servicepoint.vb#3)]

member this.MaxIdleTime : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置与 对象关联的连接在关闭前可以持续空闲的时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of time a connection associated with the object can remain idle before the connection is closed.

value.span: 与 对象关联的连接在关闭和重用于另一个连接前可以持续空闲的时间长度（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: The length of time, in milliseconds, that a connection associated with the object can remain idle before it is closed and reused for another connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以设置到指示具有关联的连接对象永远不应超时。You can set to to indicate that a connection associated with the object should never time out. 默认值属性为的值属性时创建对象。The default value of the property is the value of the property when the object is created. 对后续更改属性具有不会影响现有对象。Subsequent changes to the property have no effect on existing objects. 当关联的连接的是超出，连接保持打开状态直到应用程序尝试使用的连接。When the for a connection associated with a is exceeded, the connection remains open until the application tries to use the connection. 此时，框架将关闭连接并创建新的连接到远程主机。At that time, the Framework closes the connection and creates a new connection to the remote host. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性来设置和检索空闲时间。The following code example uses the property to set and retrieve the idle time. [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePoint#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CPP/servicepoint.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePoint#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CS/servicepoint.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePoint#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/VB/servicepoint.vb#3)]

exception.span: 被设置为小于 或大于 。

span.span: is set to less than or greater than .

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetTcpKeepAlive (bool enabled, int keepAliveTime, int keepAliveInterval);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetTcpKeepAlive(bool enabled, int32 keepAliveTime, int32 keepAliveInterval) cil managed
Public Sub SetTcpKeepAlive (enabled As Boolean, keepAliveTime As Integer, keepAliveInterval As Integer)
public: void SetTcpKeepAlive(bool enabled, int keepAliveTime, int keepAliveInterval);
member this.SetTcpKeepAlive : bool * int * int -> unit

param.name: enabled
param.span: 如果设置为 true，则使用指定的 keepAliveTime 和 keepAliveInterval 值启用 TCP 连接上的 TCP keep-alive 选项。

span.span: If set to true, then the TCP keep-alive option on a TCP connection will be enabled using the specified keepAliveTime and keepAliveInterval values.

param.span: 如果设置为 false，则将禁用 TCP keep-alive 选项，并忽略剩余参数。

span.span: If set to false, then the TCP keep-alive option is disabled and the remaining parameters are ignored.
The default value is false.

param.name: keepAliveTime
param.span: 指定发送第一个 keep-alive 数据包之前没有活动的超时时间（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: Specifies the timeout, in milliseconds, with no activity until the first keep-alive packet is sent.
The value must be greater than 0.

param.span: 如果传递的值小于或等于零，则会引发 。

span.span: If a value of less than or equal to zero is passed an is thrown.

param.name: keepAliveInterval
param.span: 指定当未收到确认消息时发送连续 keep-alive 数据包之间的间隔（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: Specifies the interval, in milliseconds, between when successive keep-alive packets are sent if no acknowledgement is received.
The value must be greater than 0.

param.span: 如果传递的值小于或等于零，则会引发 。

span.span: If a value of less than or equal to zero is passed an is thrown.

summary.span: 对 TCP 连接启用或禁用 keep-alive 选项。

span.span: Enables or disables the keep-alive option on a TCP connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可以请求 TCP/IP 提供程序允许使用 TCP 连接上保持活动数据包。An application can request that a TCP/IP provider enable the use of keep-alive packets on a TCP connection. 默认为使用 TCP 连接上保持活动数据包已禁用。The default is that the use of keep-alive packets on a TCP connection is disabled. TCP 套接字时的默认设置初始化到 2 小时的设置保持活动超时和保持活动状态的时间间隔为 1 秒。The default settings when a TCP socket is initialized sets the keep-alive timeout to 2 hours and the keep-alive interval to 1 second. `keepAliveTime`参数指定的超时，以毫秒为单位，在发送第一个 keep-alive 数据包之前没有活动。The `keepAliveTime` parameter specifies the timeout, in milliseconds, with no activity until the first keep-alive packet is sent. `keepAliveInterval`参数指定的间隔，以毫秒为单位，介于时发送连续 keep-alive 数据包如果没有收到确认。The `keepAliveInterval` parameter specifies the interval, in milliseconds, between when successive keep-alive packets are sent if no acknowledgement is received. 保持活动状态的探测数不能更改，并设置为 10。The number of keep-alive probes cannot be changed and is set to 10. 如果 TCP 连接删除 keep-alive，因此的套接字，返回到正在进行中的任何调用，并且任何后续调用将失败并的。If a TCP connection is dropped as the result of keep-alives, a of is returned to any calls in progress on the socket, and any subsequent calls will fail with a of .

exception.span: 为 或 参数指定的值小于等于 0.

span.span: The value specified for or parameter is less than or equal to 0.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SupportsPipelining As Boolean
public: property bool SupportsPipelining { bool get(); };

summary.span: 指示 对象是否支持管道连接。

span.span: Indicates whether the object supports pipelined connections.

value.span: 如果 对象支持管道连接，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the object supports pipelined connections; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 管道允许客户端发送的持续性连接跨多个请求，而无需等待来自服务器的每个响应。Pipelining allows clients to send multiple requests across a persistent connection without waiting for each response from the server. 如已收到的请求，服务器的相同顺序发送响应。The server sends the responses in the same order as the requests were received. 管道操作是在 IETF RFC 2616 8.1.2.2 一节中详细描述。Pipelining is described in detail in IETF RFC 2616 section 8.1.2.2. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了此属性的值。The following code example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePoint#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CPP/servicepoint.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePoint#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CS/servicepoint.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePoint#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/VB/servicepoint.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseNagleAlgorithm { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseNagleAlgorithm : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 值，该值确定在此 对象所管理的连接上是否使用 Nagle 算法。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether the Nagle algorithm is used on connections managed by this object.

value.span: 如果使用 Nagle 算法，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to use the Nagle algorithm; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Nagle 算法用于缓冲的数据的小型数据包并将其传输作为单个数据包。The Nagle algorithm is used to buffer small packets of data and transmit them as a single packet. 此过程中，称为"nagling"广泛使用，因为它可以减少传输的数据包数量，并降低了每个数据包的开销。This process, referred to as "nagling," is widely used because it reduces the number of packets transmitted and lowers the overhead per packet. 更改此属性的值不影响现有连接。Changing the value of this property does not affect existing connections. 仅在更改后创建的新连接会受到影响。Only new connections created after the change are affected. 在 IETF RFC 896 完全描述 Nagle 算法。The Nagle algorithm is fully described in IETF RFC 896. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了此属性的值。The following code example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePoint#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CPP/servicepoint.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePoint#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CS/servicepoint.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePoint#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/VB/servicepoint.vb#9)]
